items.name: Apollyon
items.instructions: Defeat Mega Satan once.

items.name: Azazel
items.instructions: Take 3 Devil Deals in one run.

items.name: Bethany
items.instructions: Beat Mom’s Heart/It Lives! as Lazarus on Hard.

items.name: Lazarus
items.instructions: Have 4 Soul/Black hearts at once.

items.name: Lilith
items.instructions: Beat Greed Mode with Azazel.

items.name: Magdalene
items.instructions: Have 7+ red heart containers at once.

items.name: Samson
items.instructions: Go 2 floors in a row without taking damage.

items.name: Tainted Apollyon
items.instructions: From a fresh run: reach Home (Ascent route from Depths II). Open the closet in Mom’s bedroom while playing the corresponding character, then touch the tainted version.

items.name: Mom
items.instructions: From a fresh run: reach Depths II and beat Mom (requires defeating Mom once to unlock Womb progression in general).

items.name: Mom's Heart
items.instructions: From a fresh run: reach Womb II and beat Mom’s Heart.

items.name: It Lives!
items.instructions: From a fresh run: after enough Mom’s Heart kills, Mom’s Heart is replaced by It Lives! on Womb II.

items.name: Satan
items.instructions: From a fresh run: after Mom’s Heart/It Lives!, take the Devil Room trapdoor to Sheol and beat Satan.

items.name: Isaac (Boss)
items.instructions: From a fresh run: after Mom’s Heart/It Lives!, take the Angel Room beam to Cathedral and beat Isaac.

items.name: The Lamb
items.instructions: From a fresh run: beat Satan to unlock The Dark Room; The Lamb is the boss at the end of The Dark Room.

items.name: ??? (Boss)
items.instructions: From a fresh run: beat Isaac to unlock The Chest; ??? is the boss at the end of The Chest.

items.name: Mega Satan
items.instructions: From a fresh run: obtain both Key Pieces from Uriel & Gabriel (Angel Rooms) then open the Mega Satan door in The Chest/Dark Room.

items.name: Ultra Greed
items.instructions: From a fresh run: play Greed Mode and reach the final floor to fight Ultra Greed.

items.name: Ultra Greedier
items.instructions: From a fresh run: unlock Greedier, then finish Greedier Mode to fight Ultra Greedier.

items.name: Hush
items.instructions: From a fresh run: beat Mom’s Heart/It Lives! within the time limit to open the Blue Womb portal; beat Hush at the end.

items.name: Delirium
items.instructions: From a fresh run: reach The Void via a portal after certain bosses (commonly after Hush / Mega Satan / Chest / Dark Room) and beat Delirium.

items.name: Mother
items.instructions: From a fresh run: complete the alternate path (Downpour → Mines → Mausoleum) and assemble the Knife to access Corpse; beat Mother.

items.name: Dogma
items.instructions: From a fresh run: follow the Ascent route to Home; obtain Dad’s Note, ascend, reach Home, and beat Dogma.

items.name: The Ultra Harbingers
items.instructions: From a fresh run: after Dogma, fight Ultra Famine/Pestilence/War/Death on the way to The Beast.

items.name: The Beast
items.instructions: From a fresh run: after completing the Ascent and beating Dogma + Ultra Harbingers, beat The Beast.

items.name: Ultra Famine (The Beast)
items.instructions: From a fresh run: on the Beast route (post-Dogma), defeat this Ultra Harbinger during the ascent fight sequence.

items.name: Ultra Pestilence (The Beast)
items.instructions: From a fresh run: on the Beast route (post-Dogma), defeat this Ultra Harbinger during the ascent fight sequence.

items.name: Ultra War (The Beast)
items.instructions: From a fresh run: on the Beast route (post-Dogma), defeat this Ultra Harbinger during the ascent fight sequence.

items.name: Ultra Death (The Beast)
items.instructions: From a fresh run: on the Beast route (post-Dogma), defeat this Ultra Harbinger during the ascent fight sequence.
